result.title: An Ontology to represent renovation workflows including BIM change management
result.description: An ontology to interlink the elements of renovation workflows â€“ objects, activities, resources, sensors - to satisfy the representational needs of modern construction planning methods and practices (e.g., Takt-time planning, Last Planner), with a specific emphasis on the preconditions and effects of activities, temporal predicates, and multiple-world representation.
